== Main Inclusion Report for webkit ==

=== Requirements ===

# Availability: <nowiki>[[https://edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu/intrepid/+source/webkit|available]]</nowiki> for officially supported architectures.
# Rationale:
** provides alternative web browser engine to xulrunner.
** enables build of alternative packages in main which can use webkit (e.g. epiphany).

 0. Quality Assurance:
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions.
** Good <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/w/webkit.html|maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki>.
** No open showstopper <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:webkit|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>.
** Active <nowiki>[[http://www.webkit.org|upstream]]</nowiki>.
** 1 critical and 5 major bugs <nowiki>[[https://bugs.webkit.org/buglist.cgi?query_format=advanced&short_desc_type=allwordssubstr&short_desc=&long_desc_type=substring&long_desc=&bug_file_loc_type=allwordssubstr&bug_file_loc=&keywords_type=allwords&keywords=&bug_status=NEW&bug_status=ASSIGNED&bug_status=REOPENED&bug_severity=Blocker&bug_severity=Critical&bug_severity=Major&op_sys=Linux&emailassigned_to1=1&emailtype1=substring&email1=&emailassigned_to2=1&emailreporter2=1&emailcc2=1&emailtype2=substring&email2=&bugidtype=include&bug_id=&votes=&chfieldfrom=&chfieldto=Now&chfieldvalue=&cmdtype=doit&order=Bug+Number&field0-0-0=noop&type0-0-0=noop&value0-0-0=|reported upstream]]</nowiki>.
